Description of business continuity risks related to 
disruptions of operationsTC-SI-550a.2 Our systems and data centers, and those of our external 
service providers, could be exposed to damage or interruption 
from fire, natural disasters, constraints within our workforce 
due to pandemics such as outbreaks of COVID-19, power 
loss, telecommunications failure, unauthorized entry and 
computer viruses. T o reduce material adverse effects on our
